constraints.name: subset_constraint
constraints.description: 每局游戏中，参与的玩家集合是总玩家集合的一个子集，且每局游戏有三个玩家参与。
constraints.formal: For each game, the set of players P' is a subset of the total player set P, and |P'| = 3.

constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 每局游戏中，每个玩家手中的牌必须是唯一的，即没有重复的牌。
constraints.formal: For each player in a game, all cards in their hand are distinct.

constraints.name: ordering
constraints.description: 牌型大小关系是固定的，按照炸弹 > 牛牛 > 牛九 > ... > 牛一 > 无牛的顺序排列。
constraints.formal: The order of card types is fixed: Bomb > Bull > Bull9 > ... > Bull1 > NoBull.

constraints.name: sum_constraint
constraints.description: 五张牌中，如果存在三张点数相同或三张点数和为10的倍数，则这三张牌构成“牛”，剩余两张牌的点数和模10的结果称为“分”。
constraints.formal: If there are three cards with the same value or three cards whose sum is a multiple of 10, these three cards form a 'Bull', and the sum of the remaining two cards modulo 10 is the 'Score'.

constraints.name: range_bound
constraints.description: 每张牌的点数在2到10之间，或者为A（表示1）。
constraints.formal: Each card's value is in the range [1, 10], where A represents 1.

constraints.name: frequency_bound
constraints.description: 每张牌的花色只能是黑桃、红桃、梅花或方块之一。
constraints.formal: Each card's suit is one of {a, b, c, d}, representing spades, hearts, clubs, and diamonds respectively.

constraints.name: pairwise_exclusion
constraints.description: 每局游戏中，每位玩家的牌不能与同局其他玩家的牌重复。
constraints.formal: In each game, no two players can have the same card.

constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: 每局游戏结束后，根据牌型大小计算得分，并进行两两之间的计分。
constraints.formal: After each game, scores are calculated based on the card types, and points are awarded pairwise between players.
